Termitron::

Termitron followed her. "Where's your colony???" asked the bot "Have 
you lost your queen too?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Lynxiz::
> "Join me in finding my allies, we are sitting ducks here. Follow me 
> to the cave just down there," She points down the mountain, then 
> starts to walk towards the cave. "Come..."
> 
> 
> On 27 Feb 2001, at 1:21, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Termitron::
> > "She's avenged..!!! She's avenged!!!!"cried Termitron "The bird-
bot 
> > and aero-bot were fighting against colony's enemies out side 
while 
> > Betrayal-old-bot attemped kill her, Your Majesty was 
defenless 'cause 
> > bretayal-old-bot shot her before!!!! I liked kill him but, Areo-
bot 
> > wanted a trial to Betrayal-old-bot, he locked him down but 
BEtrayal-
> > old bot ran away and killed her, he said "She's dead"... I killed 
> > him... She was a young queen, she couldn't fight so good and in 
spite 
> > that she risked her life in the first New-colony fight... and 
she's 
> > dead.... "
> >

> > > "I... I'm sorry to hear that," replies Lynxiz softly, "Who is 
the 
> > > Queen?" Then thoughtfully, "The Queen must be your leader... 
you 
> > > should find allies and avenge your Queen's death."
> > >

> > > > 
> > > > "Faction??? Faction???... I'm Termitron I'm... "he interruped

with

> > > >

too 
> > late"
> > > >

initially

> > > > > around, now does so. "I am Lynxiz, who are you, and what is

> > > > > faction?" Lynxiz eyes the bot warily.

> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Termitron walked crying and shouting his sorrow when 
> > something

> > > > > > Linxiz.

white. "Whoa...

I
